Text: Live in L.A. is a selection of the best live recordings of concerts performed by Joe Cocker in 1972 with The Chris Stainton Band.

--------------------
Text: Live in L.A. (Joe Cocker album):  The electricity of live performance, which is the very essence of Joe Cocker, is captured on this album, providing a natural companion to his previous live classic "Mad Dogs and Englishmen".
